About Me

Hello everyone, thank You for visiting my portfolio project. 😁 Let me tell you a few things about myself...

My bio

As you have all seen my name is Marko. I was born in Šabac, where I finished primary and High school, "Šabacka gimnazija", natural sciences and mathematics. After finishing high school, I went to Novi Sad, where I began to study at the Faculty of Technical Sciences, direction E1 power systems.

I attended and completed a JAVA Junior programmer course. The main topics we covered in the course were Java backend programming (Eclipse and Spring framework), MySQL databases and frontend javascript (Angular). At the end of the course I did the project "Electronic Diary for primary schools", which you can find on my GitHub account .

I spent three months on a course at 'Greensoft' company, where we did React.js and React Native. I am constantly learning programming courses that can be found on different platforms.
